mapper.insert:
SELECT case COUNT(*) when 0 then 'res_review_1' ELSE CONCAT('res_review_',MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(res_review_num,12) AS DECIMAL))+1) END AS res_review_num FROM tb_res_review
INSERT INTO tb_res_review( res_review_num, m_id, res_num, res_review_title, res_review_contents, res_review_grade, res_review_photo, res_travel_type, res_review_visit_date )VALUES ( #{resReviewNum}, #{member.mId}, #{resNum}, #{resReviewTitle}, #{resReviewContents}, #{resReviewGrade}, #{resReviewPhoto}, #{tripType.tripTypeNum}, #{resVisitDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_res_review WHERE m_id =#{mId} and res_num =#{resNum} and res_review_status='Y';

SELECT m.m_avatar, r.*, t.trip_type_name FROM tb_res_review AS r INNER JOIN tb_member AS m INNER JOIN tb_trip_type AS t ON m.m_id = r.m_id AND r.res_travel_type = t.trip_type_num WHERE r.res_num =#{resNum} and r.res_review_status ='Y'
SELECT r.res_review_grade as grade, count(*) as gradeCnt FROM tb_res_review AS r WHERE r.res_num =#{resNum} and r.res_review_status ='Y' GROUP BY r.res_review_grade
select count(*) from tb_res_review_like where m_id = #{mId} and res_review_num = #{reviewNum}
mapper.insert:
SELECT case COUNT(*) when 0 then 'sights_review_1' ELSE CONCAT('sights_review_',MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(sights_review_num,15) AS DECIMAL))+1) END AS sights_review_num FROM tb_sights_review
INSERT INTO tb_sights_review( sights_review_num, m_id, sights_num, sights_review_title, sights_review_contents, sights_review_grade, sights_review_visit_date, sights_review_photo, sights_travel_type ) VALUES ( #{sightsReviewNum}, #{member.mId}, #{sightsNum}, #{sightsReviewTitle}, #{sightsReviewContents}, #{sightsReviewGrade}, #{sightsVisitDate}, #{sightsReviewPhoto}, #{tripType.tripTypeNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_sights_review WHERE m_id =#{mId} and sights_num =#{sightsNum} and sights_review_status='Y';

SELECT r.m_id, r.res_name, r.res_photo, rv.res_review_title, rv.res_review_contents, rv.res_review_grade, rv.res_review_reg_date FROM tb_res AS r INNER JOIN tb_res_review AS rv ON r.res_num = rv.res_num WHERE r.m_id = #{mId};

SELECT s.m_id, s.sights_name, s.sights_photo, sv.sights_review_title, sv.sights_review_contents, sv.sights_review_grade, sv.sights_review_reg_date FROM tb_sights AS s INNER JOIN tb_sights_review AS sv ON s.sights_num = sv.sights_num WHERE s.m_id = #{mId};

SELECT m.m_avatar, s.*, t.trip_type_name FROM tb_sights_review AS s INNER JOIN tb_member AS m INNER JOIN tb_trip_type AS t ON m.m_id = s.m_id AND s.sights_travel_type = t.trip_type_num WHERE s.sights_num =#{sightsNum} and s.sights_review_status ='Y'
select count(*) from tb_sights_review_like where m_id = #{mId} and sights_review_num = #{reviewNum}

update tb_res_review set res_review_status ='N' where res_review_num = #{resReviewNum}

SELECT CAST(ROUND(AVG(res_review_grade),1) AS CHAR(3)) AS score FROM tb_res_review WHERE res_num =#{resNum} and res_review_status = 'Y' GROUP BY res_num
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR(3)) AS score FROM tb_res_review WHERE res_num =#{resNum} and res_review_status = 'Y' GROUP BY res_num
SELECT CAST(ROUND(AVG(sights_review_grade),1) AS CHAR(3)) AS score FROM tb_sights_review WHERE sights_num =#{sightsNum} and sights_review_status = 'Y' GROUP BY sights_num
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR(3)) AS score FROM tb_sights_review WHERE sights_num =#{sightsNum} and sights_review_status = 'Y' GROUP BY sights_num

SELECT s.sights_review_photo FROM tb_sights_review AS s WHERE s.sights_review_photo <> '' AND s.sights_num = #{sightsNum} and s.sights_review_status = 'Y'

select m.m_gender as type, count(m.m_gender) as count from tb_sights_review as sr left outer join tb_member as m on m.m_id= sr.m_id and sr.sights_num =${sightsNum} and sr.sights_review_status ='Y' group by m.m_gender HAVING m.m_gender IS NOT null
